thread.title: The Commercial Litigation and Real Estate Law Firm of Lambert & Jakob, PLLC Announce the Launch of Their New Website
thread.title_full: The Commercial Litigation and Real Estate Law Firm of Lambert & Jakob, PLLC Announce the Launch of Their New Website

title: The Commercial Litigation and Real Estate Law Firm of Lambert & Jakob, PLLC Announce the Launch of Their New Website
text: The Commercial Litigation and Real Estate Law Firm of Lambert & Jakob, PLLC Announce the Launch of Their New Website Over Two Decades of Experience Representing Corporate Clients Across Southeastern Texas. The depth of knowledge and experience acquired by both Jakob and Lambert allows them to provide solid representation for clients in all areas of business planning and litigation. HOUSTON, TX, October 10,   The Law Offices of Lambert & Jakob, PLLC, today announced the launch of their new website. This new online resource will provide added information and improved navigation for clients of the firm, which serves the counties of Fort Bend, Harris and Waller as well as the entire Houston metropolitan area. The Law Offices of Lambert & Jakob handle a wide range of commercial litigation , corporate law and real estate law cases, including the following: - Mediation, arbitration and other methods of dispute resolution - Real estate law to include landlord-tenant issues, deed restrictions, boundary disputes, property liens, condemned properties and foreclosures - Residential and commercial real estate sales and purchases - Business law , including formation and dissolution of corporate entities, the establishment of partnership agreements and resolution of employer-employee disputes - Appeals to higher courts within the state and federal legal systems - Disagreements between homeowners associations and residents - Consumer law cases that encompass credit agreements, consumer protections and debt collection methods Lindsay Lambert and Henry Jakob are the two principals for the firm and take a hands-on approach to all cases handled by the Law Offices of Lambert & Jacob. This ensures the highest degree of personal service and attention for each client. The depth of knowledge and experience acquired by both Jakob and Lambert during their careers allows them to provide solid representation for clients in all areas of business planning and litigation. The new website allows quick and easy navigation to relevant practice areas and to the information needed by current and prospective clients of Lambert & Jakob. The site also features several ways to contact the legal firm, including an online form that allows visitors to the site to submit questions and to receive answers promptly via email or by phone at 713-640-5700. These added communication options will provide added convenience for new clients and for those with established relationships with the firm. About the Law Offices of Lambert & Jakob, PLLC Lindsay Lambert and Henry Jakob founded the Law Offices of Lambert & Jakob to serve the Houston consumer and business communities. The firm specializes in providing comprehensive civil litigation services for Houston and the surrounding areas to ensure the most positive outcomes in the legal environment.The Firm Specializes in Providing Comprehensive Civil Litigation Services for Houston and the Surrounding Area. # # #
